title: wide techno "Fornarina"
content:
Can anyone please help me identify this font?

cheers:)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [scan.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=scan.jpg) | 25.23 KB |
author: borrisz

comments.content:
_Maybe_ ‘ [Hybrid](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127133330/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=hybrid)’, _by [Ola Björling](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Ola%20Bj%C3%B6rling)_, or ‘ [SuperSonic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127133330/http:/www.superlooper.de/)’, _by [Sven Stüber](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Sven%20St%C3%BCber)_, _or even_ ‘ [formlos Organik](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127133330/http:/www.formlos.net/formlosTF/Organik)’, _by [David Hubner](http://web.archive.org/wiki/David%20Hubner) :)_, _may get you close enough_.?

—

Dav, formlos  
 _[www.formlos.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127133330/http:/www.formlos.net/)_

Thanks Dav,  
I think Hybrid looks the closest!
